The log contains only the fault record, technical data and other necessary system information of CoinCola in the selected time period, and does not include transaction records, chat records, etc.
If you have problems with dysfunction or flashback in CoinCola, please upload logs to help us better locate and solve the problem.
I have read and understood the terms set forth in CoinCola\'s User Agreement on Margin Trading I am hereby to agree and acknowledge the associated risks involved.

Margin trading confers a higher profit potential and also greater risks, which brings great amount losses if you issue a call on wrong position. Investors should be knowledge the risk and make prudent investment.

· Liquidation is calculated based on the 10% margin rate, when the price reaches this value, system will trigger a forced liquidation 
· To avoid unnecessary liquidations, we use a composite price index rather than last price for margin level calculation 
· Ratio ≥30%, Low risk, Ratio ＜30%, Moderate risk, Ratio ≤20%, High risk
· When margin ratio ≤10%, forced-liquidation will be triggered for your account in order to return the lending fund 
· Margin ratio = （Balance in the account of that margin trading pair-Margin-Interest)/ Margin* 100%

Enter your trading terms for buyers to review before placing an order. Example terms:
1. Please settle payment within stated trade time and “mark as paid after completing payment. I will release bitcoin once payment has been confirmed.
2. If you can not pay within the stated trade time, please cancel the order.
3. When the trade starts, bitcoin will be moved to the trade escrow to protect both buyer and seller.

Enter your trading terms for buyers to review before placing an order. Example terms:
1. Please settle payment within stated trade time and mark as paid after completing payment. I will release bitcoin once payment has been confirmed.
2. If you can not pay within the stated trade time, please cancel the order.
3. When the trade starts, bitcoin will be moved to the trade escrow to protect both buyer and seller.
Country (Where do you want your ad to display?)
Currency（Select the currency you want to trade）
Margin (How much profit do you want to make?)
Payment window（How much time does a buyer have to settle payment?）
Mininum trade amount can\'t be larger than wallet balance
This trade price is currently ranked: %1$s
• Maximum price can help you maintain a stable profit when prices fluctuate.\n• For example, if the maximum price is set at 12,000, your offer will be set to 12,000 even market price is over 12,000.

• Minimum price can help you maintain a stable profit when prices fluctuate.\n• For example, if the minimum price is set at 12,000, your offer will be set to 12,000 even market price is less than 12,000.

• Your offer: Based on current market price and the rate you set. Current market price is calculated based on the average number from other mainstream exchanges.\n• For example, if the market price is 1000 and ret is set at 0.500, your offer will be 2000.\n• Offers will be refreshed every 10 minutes.

• Your offer: Based on current market price and the profit margin you set. Current market price is calculated based on the average number from other mainstream exchanges.\n• For example, if the market price is 1000 and profit margin is set at 10%, your offer will be 1100.\n• Offers will be refreshed every 10 minutes.
For example, if the rate is 0.800, buying $100 worth of gift card will cost you $80 worth of bitcoin.

Please do not delete the Google verification code bound by Google Authenticator.

Enabling Google 2-Step Verification adds an extra layer of security to your account. When you enable it, you\’ll need to enter a Google verification code to complete transactions.
How to enable :

1. Install the Google Authenticator mobile app<\/a> on your phone.

2. Using the Google Authenticator app, select \'Add new account\' (Android users) or the \'+\' symbol (iOS users). Either enter the Key code listed above or select \'Scan barcode\' and scan the QR code above to bind your account.
Install the Google Authenticator mobile app on your phone and scan the QR code or copy the key to the app

• Please don’t deposit any other digital assets except %1$s to the above address.

It usually takes %1$d minutes to receive BTC through the BTC network. The minimum deposit amount is %2$s BTC. We will not handle any deposit requests that are less than that. Internal transfers between CoinCola users are completed in real-time and charged at the same rate as regular withdrawls.
Both a %1$s and an Address are required to successfully deposit your %2$s to CoinCola.
• Assets sent from smart contract wallets will not be accepted.
• Both a %1$s and an Address are required to successfully deposit your %2$s to CoinCola.
